job.title: Senior Embedded Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Senior Embedded Software Engineer </strong></p><p><strong>Location:</strong> San Francisco Bay Area - Flexible hybrid onsite/remote schedule</p><p><br></p><p>Opportunity to join an innovative tech company within the Autonomous Vehicle space, working on full lifecycle Software Development for the company's next generation products.</p><p><br></p><p>As a Senior Software Engineer, you will be responsible for developing reliable C++ (Embedded/Linux) Software to a high standard set by the company and industry.</p><p>This will involve all stages from early development of prototypes, through to testing and ensuring manufacturability of the final products.</p><p><br></p><p>The company have some very ambitious growth plans, making this a great time to join for your personal career development!</p><p><br></p><p>The ideal candidate will have experience in:</p><ul><li>Working in Embedded systems environment</li><li>Extensive C/C++ development</li><li>Linux development.</li><li>Yocto experience is desirable</li><li>Degree in relevant discipline</li></ul><p>You will be working closely with the Hardware team (Electrical/PCB design Engineers), so a basic understanding of reading schematics and board layout would be desirable.</p><p><br></p><p>The company offer a very competitive compensation as well as a comprehensive benefits package.</p><p><br></p><p>If you're looking for a new challenge and a chance to progress you skills and career further, APPLY now!</p>
